ğŸ‘‹ Hello, I'm Youngjee Park.

I'd like to briefly introduce myself by sharing the journey that has shaped who I am today.

My journey began with a fascination for astronomy as a child, which eventually led me to study it in university. But along the way, I realized what I truly enjoy is building thingsâ€”solving problems, designing systems, and bringing ideas to life through code.

Living and working in Korea, China, Taiwan, and now Canada has taught me how to adapt quickly, keep learning, and connect across cultures. I've built everything from web platforms to data tools, and I genuinely enjoy the process of figuring things out from scratch.

I'm always looking for meaningful work with thoughtful people. If you think I could be a good fit for your team, Iâ€™d love to connect.

Contact

    • Email: pyjee8@gmail.com
    • GitHub: github.com/PatriciaPark
    • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/pyjee8
